titleStmt.title: Moses made angry, or, A letter written and sent to Dr. Hill, master of Trinity Colledg in Cambridg upon occasion of some hard passages that fell from him in a sermon preached at Pauls, May 4, 1651 / by John Goodwin.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Henry Cripps and Lodowick Lloyd ...,
